pkgmetadata.longdescription: MusicBrainz Picard is a cross-platform MusicBrainz tag editor written in Python. Picard Tagger is intended to be the next generation of tagger for MusicBrainz, with a focus on album oriented tagging as opposed to track based tagging and cross platform compatibility.

use.flag: Enable reading the ID of the inserted CD
Enable calculation and lookup of AcoustID fingerprints
Enable enhanced internal documentation (scripting, plugins, etc.)
